amenities.question: What amenities does The View offer?
amenities.answer: The View features a private sauna, a bubble bathtub, stunning views, and a full smart home experience, including a romance mode with customized lighting and music.

capacity.question: How many people can stay at The View?
capacity.answer: The lodge is designed for a maximum of two guests, providing the perfect setting for an intimate and romantic retreat.

pets.question: Can I bring my pet or child?
pets.answer: Pets are not allowed. Infants are welcome, but The View is primarily designed as a romantic getaway for adults.

booking.heading: Booking Terms
booking.intro: By making a reservation at The View, you agree to these terms and conditions. All bookings are subject to availability and confirmation.

reservationProcess.heading: Reservation Process
reservationProcess.item1: Reservations can be made through our official booking platform or by direct contact
reservationProcess.item2: Booking confirmation will be sent via email within 24 hours
reservationProcess.item3: Full payment is required 14 days before check-in

guestCapacity.heading: Guest Capacity
guestCapacity.text: The View accommodates a maximum of 2 guests. Infants are welcome but must be declared at the time of booking. The property is designed as a romantic retreat for adults.

cancellation.heading: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.notice: Cancellations must be made in writing via email or through our booking platform. The cancellation date is determined by when we receive your written cancellation notice.

checkOut.heading: Check-out
checkOut.note: Late check-out may be available upon request

effectiveDate.notice: These terms and conditions are effective immediately and apply to all bookings made after this date.
